key.name: notification
key.summary: Show a notification when a timer ends

key.name: inhibit
key.summary: Inhibit screen lock
key.description: 0 - off 1 - Inhibit logging out 2 - Inhibit user switching 4 - Inhibit suspending the session or computer 8 - Inhibit the session being marked as idle

key.name: inhibit-max
key.summary: Maximum amount of time to inhibit screen lock, in seconds
key.description: 0 is no maximum, positive integer specifies the number of seconds

key.name: notification-sticky
key.summary: Make the notification wait for input

key.name: notification-longtimeout
key.summary: Long timeout for sticky notifications, default is 30 seconds

key.name: show-endtime
key.summary: Show the time when the timer will expire rather than the countdown

key.name: show-time
key.summary: Show time remaining in panel menu

key.name: show-progress
key.summary: Show timer progress in panel menu

key.name: show-label
key.summary: Show timer name in panel menu

key.name: play-sound
key.summary: Play sound notifications

key.name: sound-loops
key.summary: Number of times to ring alarm sound, 0 is the duration of notification

key.name: sound-file
key.summary: Path to sound file

key.name: default-timer
key.summary: Default length of timer in seconds

key.name: timers
key.summary: Array of Timer descriptions

key.name: quick-timers
key.summary: Array of Quick Timer descriptions

key.name: timers-json
key.summary: timers configuration stored as json
key.description: Experimental feature for storing timer data

key.name: sort-by-duration
key.summary: Sort list of timers by duration

key.name: sort-descending
key.summary: Sort from longest to shortest

key.name: save-quick-timers
key.summary: Save quick timers between sessions if enabled

key.name: detect-dupes
key.summary: Prevent creation of duplicate timers of the same type

key.name: running
key.summary: State of running timers as json string

key.name: volume-threshold
key.summary: Low volume threshold in percent

key.name: prefer-presets
key.summary: Heuristic counter to prefer displaying the quick or preset menus expanded

key.name: volume-level-warn
key.summary: Warn if volume levels are below threshold

key.name: debug
key.summary: Turn on debugging

key.name: accel-enable
key.summary: Enable keyboard shortcuts

key.name: accel-show-endtime
key.summary: Keyboard shortcut for toggling show-end-time setting
